text: Boola; okhubareba – “Nishindu shina, eshiobuloli bwashio ni obukali muno? Mana oboole; “Nyasaye – niye Omuloli wa hakari wefu ninanyu. Ne Ikurani ino yafumbulilwa esie kho ebekanyilisilie khuyo nende buli yesi owa yololela. Koo toto enywe muchamanga mbu baliho abanyasaye bandi halala nende Nyasaye?” Boola “Esie shenjama endio tawe” Boola; -khandi “Ye ni Nyasaye mulala butswa. Ne esie endi ehale muno nende ako akamutsokasinjia.”
